translation: Ae mkhaṭb! Tʿjb kr qryshn hndi milh czaruk th bahmy aulftuk.

Khṣvṣaan chuh tihund bahmy alft vndkis th ryth kalh kis sfrs andr. (vnds andr chhi tim sfr kran yamns kun, ryth kals chhi sfr kran shams kun. Yimn don jayn chhi yim qrysh tjart kran yimn doshvnụ̄ mlkn hindụ̄ lvukh ạsụ̄ yimn setthah tʿẓym v tkrym kran kʿbh shryfkụ̄ hmsae th khạdim āsnh mokhh, timn yylhi yhi svre tʿẓym v tkrym chuh amy kʿbh shryf kh brkth.(
Ps krin tim amhi ʿẓymu alshan grh kis mạlkh snz ʿbadt, but prsty nishhi rvuzin dvur.

Yymụ̄ mạlkn yimn ʿṭa kvr bochhi vizi ṭʿām byyhi yymụ̄ amn v aman duyvtunkh khvfh nishhi, (mks andr avs nh ghlh pạd spdan kynhh thi, tmhi mokh ạsụ̄ aatikụ̄ lvukh qrysh vriyas andr tjarth khạṭr doyhi phri sfr kran. Grmy andr shams kun gczhan, srdy andr ymns kun. Timn mulkn hndụ̄ lvukh ạsụ̄ yimn ahli ḥrm byyhi khadmi bytu Allah āsnh mokhh setthah tʿẓym kran. Yihndi jan v malch ḥfaẓt kran vathi thi avsnh kunhi jayhi yihndis mals kanhh tʿrẓ kran. Nfʿ thi avs yimn kạfy ḥạṣl spdan. Baqy vqts ạsụ̄ yim qrysh āram v ʿīshhi san zndgy bsr kran, yth svrs mnz chuh aamiy vaqʿuuk dhikr.)
